name: Message:
text: Hey, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, we just met you. And this is crazy. But {{roomNumber}} is your room number. So confirm your reservation maybe?

name: Confirm reservation
text: Hey, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, we just met you. And this is crazy. But {{roomNumber}} is your room number. So confirm your reservation maybe?

name: Room ready
text: {{timeGreeting}} {{firstName}}, and welcome to {{company}}! Room {{roomNumber}} is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.

name: Confirm times
text: {{firstName}}, your reservation in room {{roomNumber}} at {{company}} has been confirmed for {{startTimestamp}} to {{endTimestamp}}.
